      • waitForWebElement

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement waitForWebElement(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                                               org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                                               int timeout)
        Waits for the WebElement located by locator to exist or timeout seconds to transpire, whichever happens first.
        Parameters:
        driver - The WebDriver instance to use to process this wait
        locator - The By object to use to locate the WebElement
        timeout - The maximum number of seconds that should transpire
        Returns:
        the WebElement if it exists, null otherwise

      • waitForWebElementDNE

        public static boolean waitForWebElementDNE(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                                           org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                           int timeout)
        Waits up to 'timeout' seconds for the WebElement described by 'locator' to no longer exist within the context of 'driver'
        Parameters:
        driver - The WebDriver instance to use when locating the WebElement
        locator - The by instance that describes the WebElement
        timeout - The number of seconds to wait for the WebElement to no longer exist
        Returns:
        true if the WebElement no longer exists and false otherwise

      • getWebElementIdentifier

        public static org.openqa.selenium.By getWebElementIdentifier(java.lang.String expression,
                                                             java.lang.String by)
        Allows for translation of two strings to a By instance. The first parameter, String expression, is the parameter passed to the static By creator methods. The second parameter, String by, is used to determine which By creator method to invoke.
        Parameters:
        expression - the expression used to construct the By instance
        by - the type of By instance to create
        Returns:
        a By instance for the requested WebElement

      • refreshUntilWebElementExists

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement refreshUntilWebElementExists(org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                                                          int timeout,
                                                                          int interval)
        Refresh the page every interval seconds, for up to timeout seconds, until the WebElement located by locator exists.
        Parameters:
        locator - The WebElement to wait for
        timeout - The max duration of the wait
        interval - The interval at which to refresh the page
        Returns:
        The WebElement if it can be located, null otherwise.

      • refreshUntilWebElementExists

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement refreshUntilWebElementExists(org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                                                          int timeout)
        Refresh the page every 10 seconds, for up to timeout seconds, until the WebElement located by locator exists.
        Parameters:
        locator - The WebElement to wait for
        timeout - The max duration of the wait
        Returns:
        The WebElement if it can be located, null otherwise.

      • refreshUntilWebElementExists

        public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement refreshUntilWebElementExists(org.openqa.selenium.By locator)
        Refresh the page every 10 seconds, for up to 600 seconds, until the WebElement located by locator exists.
        Parameters:
        locator - The WebElement to wait for
        Returns:
        The WebElement if it can be located, null otherwise.
